import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import rootReducer from'./reducers';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import{createLogger}from'redux-logger';import rootSagas from'./reducers/rootSagas';import createHistory from'history/createBrowserHistory';import{routerMiddleware}from'react-router-redux';export var history=createHistory();var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[//
sagaMiddleware,routerMiddleware(history)];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){var logger=createLogger();middlewares.push(logger);}var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSagas);export default store;
